lines.text: I've been in your service since I was two and a half, my lord.
Well that is the why I am so utterly sick of the sight of you.
[Percy and Queen Elizabeth are playing frisbee]
Shut up, Balders. You'd laugh at a Shakespeare comedy.
The path of my life is strewn with cowpats from the Devil's own satanic HERD.
Have you got a plan, my lord?
Yes I have, and it's so cunning you could brush your teeth with it.
This is no time for jokes Blackadder, we've been kidnapped!

[remembering that he said 'only real idiots get kindapped']
Ooooh God! How incredibly embarrassing!
